Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in handlebars.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.0.7, all versions starting from 4.0.0 before 4.0.14, all versions starting from 4.1.0 before 4.1.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.0.7 before 4.0.0, all versions starting from 4.0.14 before 4.1.0, all versions starting from 4.1.2
